Author: x24throwaway
Text: You can create your own recipes/meals on there when you cook and add the ingredients. You can also add foods that are not already on the app.   With the predefined weights, sometimes it takes some maths to get the correct serving size/calories.   Idk I figure out my own calories and then keep a record using the app, so I’ll search a food and if the serving size I had is not listed or if the calories are wrong, I just adjust the inputs until it’s correct.   There are definitely going to be inaccuracies and discrepancies though, based on a number of factors. Unfortunately that’s just the reality of it.
